The video was published on a verified Fa: CABLE on March 9, 2015, which predates the claim being made.
The video in the claim shows a boy kicki: s shopping trolley, while the i-CABLE footage shows protesters shouting at mainland tourists and one of them kicking the trolley.
The i: CABLE logo can be seen in the top left-hand corner of the video in the misleading post, confirming its source.
